fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use the factional douse to spread the flames, dousing anyone who visits a currently doused player. 1-shot.
- Keep a lookout, dousing anyone who visits a member of the Underworld. 1-shot.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you carry the factional douse, you will additionally douse anyone who visits your original target.
- If the Apocalypse dies, you will become the Apocalypse.
